heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
guidesSubtitle: Our team of experienced guides is here to support you on your healing journey.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated on our upcoming events and be part of our healing community.
footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application settings and content from here.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Enter your information to create a new account.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral beverage from the Amazon, prepared from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, indigenous cultures have used it in ceremonies as a tool for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The active component of Ayahuasca, DMT, interacts with brain receptors to induce altered states of consciousness. During this process, participants can access deep memories, repressed emotions, and a profound connection with their inner self and the universe, facilitating a powerful journey of self-knowledge and healing.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a master plant, a wise spirit that guides and teaches. Each ceremony is a unique and personal dialogue with this ancient wisdom, offering clarity, revealing life purpose, and healing deep wounds.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps release mental blocks and negative thought patterns, providing a clearer and more objective perspective on life.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the processing and release of deep-rooted traumas and emotions, promoting inner peace and emotional balance.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and strengthens the connection with one's own spirituality, the community, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Our group ceremonies are held in a safe and respectful environment, where the collective energy enhances the healing process. They are ideal for those seeking to share their journey and feel the support of a community.
privateCeremonyDescription: We offer private ceremonies for individuals or small groups seeking a more intimate and personalized experience. These sessions are tailored to the specific needs and intentions of the participants, providing a space of deep introspection and personalized accompaniment.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn more about Ayahuasca, its origin, its effects, and how it can help you in your healing process.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you with respect and wisdom throughout your ceremonial experience.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to the ceremony details here. Click save when you're done.

guidesPageSubtitle: Each of our guides has been trained in Amazonian traditions and has years of experience leading ceremonies. They are here to provide a safe, respectful, and deeply healing space.
editGuideDescription: Make changes to the guide's profile.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this guide? This action is permanent.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore our upcoming events and find the one that resonates with you.

chatHistorySubtitle: Review past conversations with the spiritual guide.
allConversationsDescription: List of all recorded chat sessions.
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin aligning your body and mind with a specific diet and clear intentions.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The night of the ceremony, you connect with the medicine in a sacred and safe space.
experienceProcessDescription: You navigate your inner world, guided by the medicine and the 'icaros' (sacred songs).
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, you process the learnings and apply them to your daily life.
dietTitle: The 'Dieta': Body and Soul in Harmony
dietSubtitle: The pre-ceremony diet is crucial to purify the body and open the spirit to receive the medicine's teachings.
allowedFoodsList: Grains like quinoa, rice, and oats
White meats (chicken, fish) boiled or grilled
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your intention is the compass of your journey. Dedicate time to clarify what you seek to heal or understand.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and increase your presence.
intentionsDescription: What do you want to ask the medicine? What do you want to release? Write down your intentions.
reflectionDescription: Write about your fears, hopes, and what you want to transform in your life.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring up repressed emotions. It is a process of purification. Trust, breathe, and allow what needs to be released to flow. Do not resist; the medicine is wise and will only show you what you are ready to heal.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare for a comfortable and profound night. We recommend bringing the following:
comfortItemsList: A change of clothes for the next day
preparationCtaDescription: Access our complete guide to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for this transformative journey.

questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be reviewed by our team to ensure you can safely participate in the ceremony.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your information has been saved.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart, blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, or supplements)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of serious mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other psychoactive plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you seek to heal, understand, or transform...
errorRequiredDetails: If you answered 'yes', please provide details.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was an error saving your questionnaire. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: You are one step closer to your transformation. To continue, we invite you to review our preparation guide.
